DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether modified form ARTAS ( Antiretroviral Treatment Access Services ) intervention , adapt HIV patient fall care , successful re-engaging patient care reduce HIV-1 viral load .
DOC.criteria: HIV patient least one primary care appointment since 1/1/10 currently lose followup define 1 ) currently care great 7 month 2 ) NOT two complete clinic visit separate three month time 12month observation period ( HRSAHAB measure retention care ) 3 ) 2 `` show '' schedule visit patient arrive cancel past 12 month . 19 year old Be able willing provide inform consent Be willing provide locator information Be willing sign HIPAA authorization form/medical record release form facilitate medical record abstraction Report living vicinity Be able communicate English . Not meet one inclusion criterion Have significant cognitive developmental impairment extent unable provide inform consent Incarcerated time potential enrollment Are terminate via site PI decision
